verses.verse: The word <WH1697> of Yahweh <WH3068> came to me, <WH559> saying,

Son <WH1121> of man, <WH120> prophesy <WH5012> against the shepherds <WH7462> of Israel, <WH3478> prophesy, <WH5012> and tell <WH559> them, <WH7462> even to the shepherds, Thus says <WH559> the Lord <WH136> Yahweh: <WH136> Woe <WH1945> to the shepherds <WH7462> of Israel <WH3478> who feed <WH7462> themselves! <WH7462> Shouldn't the shepherds feed <WH7462> the sheep? <WH6629>
You eat <WH398> the fat, <WH2459> and you clothe <WH3847> yourself with the wool, <WH6785> you kill <WH2076> the fatlings; <WH1277> but you don't <WH1277> feed the sheep. <WH6629>

You haven't <WH2388> strengthened the diseased, <WH2470> neither have you healed <WH7495> that which was sick, <WH2470> neither have you bound up <WH2280> that which was broken, <WH7665> neither have you brought back <WH7725> that which was driven away, <WH5080> neither have you sought <WH1245> that which was lost; <WH6> but with force <WH2394> and with rigor <WH6531> you have ruled over them. <WH7287>
They were scattered, <WH6327> because there was no shepherd; <WH7462> and they became food <WH402> to all the animals <WH2416> of the field, <WH7704> and were scattered. <WH6327>

My sheep <WH6629> wandered <WH7686> through all the mountains, <WH2022> and on every high <WH7311> hill: <WH1389> yes, <WH6629> my sheep were scattered <WH6327> on all the surface <WH6440> of the earth; <WH776> and there was none who searched <WH1875> or sought. <WH1245>
Therefore, <WH7462> you shepherds, hear <WH8085> the word <WH1697> of Yahweh: <WH3068>

As I live, <WH2416> says <WH5002> the Lord <WH136> Yahweh, <WH136> surely because my sheep <WH6629> became a prey, <WH957> and my sheep <WH6629> became food <WH402> to all the animals <WH2416> of the field, <WH7704> because there was no shepherd, <WH7462> neither did my shepherds <WH7462> search <WH1875> for my sheep, <WH6629> but the shepherds <WH7462> fed <WH7462> themselves, <WH7462> and didn't feed my sheep; <WH6629>
therefore, <WH7462> you shepherds, hear <WH8085> the word <WH1697> of Yahweh: <WH3068>

Thus says <WH559> the Lord <WH136> Yahweh: <WH3069> Behold, <WH7462> I am against the shepherds; and I will require <WH1875> my sheep <WH6629> at their hand, <WH3027> and cause them to cease <WH7673> from feeding <WH7462> the sheep; <WH6629> neither shall the shepherds <WH7462> feed <WH7462> themselves any more; <WH5337> and I will deliver my sheep <WH6629> from their mouth, <WH6310> that they may not be food for them. <WH402>
For thus says <WH559> the Lord <WH136> Yahweh: <WH136> Behold, <WH1875> I myself, even I, will search for my sheep, <WH6629> and will seek them out. <WH1239>

As a shepherd <WH7462> seeks out <WH1243> his flock <WH5739> in the day <WH3117> that he is among <WH8432> his sheep <WH6629> that are scattered <WH6567> abroad, <WH1239> so will I seek out my sheep; <WH6629> and I will deliver <WH5337> them out of all places <WH4725> where they have been scattered <WH6327> in the cloudy <WH6051> and dark <WH6205> day. <WH3117>

I will bring them out <WH3318> from the peoples, <WH5971> and gather <WH6908> them from the countries, <WH776> and will bring <WH935> them into their own land; <WH127> and I will feed <WH7462> them on the mountains <WH2022> of Israel, <WH3478> by the watercourses, <WH650> and in all the inhabited places <WH4186> of the country. <WH776>

I will feed <WH7462> them with good <WH2896> pasture; <WH4829> and on the mountains <WH2022> of the height <WH4791> of Israel <WH3478> shall their fold <WH5116> be: <WH7257> there shall they lie down in a good <WH2896> fold; <WH5116> and on fat <WH8082> pasture <WH4829> shall they feed <WH7462> on the mountains <WH2022> of Israel. <WH3478>
I myself will be the shepherd <WH7462> of my sheep, <WH6629> and I will cause them to lie down, <WH7257> says <WH5002> the Lord <WH136> Yahweh. <WH3069>

I will seek <WH1245> that which was lost, <WH6> and will bring back <WH7725> that which was driven away, <WH5080> and will bind up <WH2280> that which was broken, <WH7665> and will strengthen <WH2388> that which was sick: <WH2470> but the fat <WH8082> and the strong <WH2389> I will destroy; <WH8045> I will feed <WH7462> them in justice. <WH4941>

As for you, <WH859> O my flock, <WH6629> thus says <WH559> the Lord <WH136> Yahweh: <WH136> Behold, <WH8199> I judge between sheep <WH7716> and sheep, <WH7716> the rams <WH352> and the male goats. <WH6260>

Does it seem a small thing <WH4592> to you to have fed <WH7462> on the good <WH2896> pasture, <WH4829> but you must tread down <WH7429> with your feet <WH7272> the residue <WH3499> of your pasture? <WH4829> and to have drunk <WH8354> of the clear <WH4950> waters, <WH4325> but you must foul <WH7515> the residue <WH3498> with your feet? <WH7272>
As for my sheep, <WH6629> they eat <WH7462> that which you have trodden <WH4823> with your feet, <WH7272> and they drink <WH8354> that which you have fouled <WH4833> with your feet. <WH7272>
Therefore thus says <WH559> the Lord <WH136> Yahweh <WH136> to them: <WH8199> Behold, I, even I, will judge between the fat <WH1274> sheep <WH7716> and the lean <WH7330> sheep. <WH7716>

Because you thrust <WH1920> with side <WH6654> and with shoulder, <WH3802> and push <WH5055> all the diseased <WH2470> with your horns, <WH7161> until you have scattered <WH6327> them abroad; <WH2351>
therefore will I save <WH3467> my flock, <WH6629> and they shall no more be a prey; <WH957> and I will judge <WH8199> between sheep <WH7716> and sheep. <WH7716>

I will set up <WH6965> one <WH259> shepherd <WH7462> over them, <WH7462> and he shall feed them, <WH5650> even my servant David; <WH1732> he shall feed <WH7462> them, <WH7462> and he shall be their shepherd.
I, <WH3068> Yahweh, will be their God, <WH430> and my servant <WH5650> David <WH1732> prince <WH5387> among <WH8432> them; <WH3068> I, Yahweh, have spoken it. <WH1696>

I will make <WH3772> with them a covenant <WH1285> of peace, <WH7965> and will cause evil <WH7451> animals <WH2416> to cease <WH7673> out of the land; <WH776> and they shall dwell <WH3427> securely <WH983> in the wilderness, <WH4057> and sleep <WH3462> in the woods. <WH3293>

I will make <WH5414> them and the places around <WH5439> my hill <WH1389> a blessing; <WH1293> and I will cause the shower <WH1653> to come down <WH3381> in its season; <WH6256> there shall be showers <WH1653> of blessing. <WH1293>

The tree <WH6086> of the field <WH7704> shall yield <WH5414> its fruit, <WH6529> and the earth <WH776> shall yield <WH5414> its increase, <WH2981> and they shall be secure <WH983> in their land; <WH127> and they shall know <WH3045> that I am Yahweh, <WH3068> when I have broken <WH7665> the bars <WH4133> of their yoke, <WH5923> and have delivered <WH5337> them out of the hand <WH3027> of those who made slaves of them. <WH5647>

They shall no more be a prey <WH957> to the nations, <WH1471> neither shall the animals <WH2416> of the earth <WH776> devour <WH398> them; <WH3427> but they shall dwell securely, <WH983> and none shall make them afraid. <WH2729>

I will raise up <WH6965> to them a plantation <WH4302> for renown, <WH8034> and they shall be no more consumed <WH622> with famine <WH7458> in the land, <WH776> neither bear <WH5375> the shame <WH3639> of the nations any more. <WH1471>

They shall know <WH3045> that I, <WH3068> Yahweh, their God <WH430> am with them, <WH1004> and that they, the house of Israel, <WH3478> are my people, <WH5971> says <WH5002> the Lord <WH136> Yahweh. <WH3069>
You <WH859> my sheep, <WH6629> the sheep <WH6629> of my pasture, <WH4830> are men, <WH120> and I am your God, <WH430> says <WH5002> the Lord <WH136> Yahweh. <WH3069>
